articles.description: The Philadelphia Eagles run the Washington Commanders ragged to win 55-23 and reach their second Super Bowl in three years.
articles.title: NFL play-off results: Philadelphia Eagles reach Super Bowl 59 after beating Washington Commanders

articles.description: BBC Sport explores how the Six Nations has evolved since 2000, from landmark moments to thrilling finishes and record try counts.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Are we living in the the rugby tournament's golden age?

articles.description: Manchester City are responsible for more than half of all money spent so far in this January transfer window - with one week until deadline day.
articles.title: Premier League transfers: January spend higher than last year with one week left

articles.description: After Ruben Amorim publicly criticised Marcus Rashford, BBC Sport looks at other examples of managers calling out their players.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: What happens when managers publicly criticise their own players?

articles.description: Scrum-half Alex Mitchell is set to be fit for England's Six Nations game with Ireland in Dublin on Saturday.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: England's Alex Mitchell set to be fit for Ireland opener

articles.description: Mitchell Owen smashes a scintillating 39-ball century to lead Hobart Hurricanes to their maiden Big Bash League title.
articles.title: Big Bash League 2024-25: Mitch Owen's century leads Hobart Hurricanes to title

articles.description: The 36-year-old was one of several suspects apprehended by Belgian police on Monday.
articles.title: Nainggolan: Belgian footballer arrested in cocaine investigation

articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Ruben Amorim suggests he'd rather pick 63-year-old coach over forward

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu loses to world number 101 Cristina Bucsa of Spain in the opening round of the Singapore Open.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: British number two loses at Singapore Open

articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Scotland call up Alexander Masibaka of Angouleme
